title: The Diaries of Menopausal Women
description: Silenced no more, "Diaries of the Menopausal Women" unleashes secrets from ACROSS THE GLOBE, taking you on an emotional and empowering journey through real LIFE stories and experiences.Written from a compilation of interviews conducted with a diverse group of women and woven into the authorâ€™s own personal journey, A SISTERHOOD IS BORN.This book allows you to get upfront and personal with all things menopause - the highs, the lows, the hot flushes, finding enlightenment and everything in between.Look inside their lives as they face their vulnerabilities and lay bare their all. Paving the way for the next generation to enter this journey, the women seek to solve the many mysteries of this Menopausal mayhem. Laugh with us, cry with us and hear our truths in this awe-inspiring account. Most importantly...realise that you are not alone. It is a journey of togetherness. So do not be afraid, be still, learn to breathe and we will make it.
author: Jacqueline Golding
